name: Singlebrook_Technology
tag_list: mobile-development, app-development, custom-web-applications, b-corporation, iphone-apps, mobile-optimization
overview:
Singlebrook is a team of web programmers and designers who are passionate about web and mobile technology and about making a difference in the world.

With a mission of “Technology for Change”, Singlebrook provides technology services that empower their clients to make a difference. Singlebrook is a certified B Corporation, which means that social values and sustainability efforts are written into their corporate DNA.

Singlebrook is based in Ithaca, NY, with clients in Washington DC, New York City, San Francisco, Boulder and throughout the US. They don’t outsource. Singlebrook uses an Agile project management style which is a flexible and efficient method of building custom web software. Clients include entrepreneurs, social ventures, non-profits, associations and educational institutions.

Services include: Custom web application development in Ruby on Rails and ColdFusion; Mobile app development for iPhones, iPads, Androids and other smart phones using PhoneGap, Objective C and Java; Content Management System (CMS) implementation using Drupal; Other specialties like Databases, Integration, Web Security and Web Design.
